synopsis.text:
Thatâ€™s a recipe for chaos when Akito Himenokouji and his twin sister, Akiko, find themselves living under the same roof after years of separation. Akiko's joy knows no bounds, but her excitement isn't just about the reunion. She's harboring feelings that go beyond sibling love, and she's not shy about expressing them. However, Akito only sees her as a sister, which doesn't deter Akiko from her mission to win his heart.

Their unconventional love story takes a turn for the complicated when three beautiful girls from the student council move in with them. Akito, now surrounded by admiring females, becomes the center of attention, much to Akiko's dismay. The girls, each with their own designs on Akito, engage in a rivalry that adds fuel to the already heated atmosphere.

Amidst this whirlwind of romantic tension and sibling rivalry, Akiko remains steadfast in her pursuit of her brother's affection. But will her unyielding determination be enough to overcome the challenges posed by their new housemates? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of love, sibling rivalry, and unexpected twists.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
